text: (he nabee!) kya aapane us vyakti kee dasha par vichaar nahin kiya, jisane ibraaheem se usake paalanahaar ke vishay mein vivaad kiya, isalie ki allaah ne use raajy diya tha? jab ibraaheem ne kahaah mera paalanahaar vo hai, jo jeevit karata tatha maarata hai, to usane kahaah main bhee jeevit[1] karata tatha maarata hoon. ibraaheem ne kahaah allaah soory ko poorv se laata hai, too use pashchim se le aa! (ye sunakar) kaafir chakit rah gaya aur allaah atyaachaariyon ko maargadarshan nahin deta
